name: Father Figure Eau de Parfum Perfume Duo Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody..Scent Type:Warm Woods.Key Notes:Lush Fig, Jasmine Dew, Sandalwood.Set Description:Rooted in lushness, Father Figure is a vivid, green fragrance that captures the intimate feeling of cool. It opens with notes of fleshy fig and dewy cassis, then folds into notes of creamy sandalwood, orris root, and vanilla Madagascar. Father Figure is layered and vibrant..This Set Contains:- 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Father Figure Eau de Parfum.Clean at Sephora
ingredients: Ethylene Brassylate, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Oxacyclohexadec-12-En-2-One, (12e)-, Pentadecalactone, Methyl Dihydrojasmonate, Tetrahydro-Methyl-Methylpropyl)-Pyran-4-Ol, Dodecahydro-Tetramethylnaphthofuran, Cedrol, Dipropylene Glycol, Isopropyl Myristate, Methylcyclopentadecenone, 2,6-Dimethyl-7-Octen-2-Ol, Cyclamen Aldehyde, Methyl Ionones, Piper Nigrum (Pepper) Fruit Oil, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Limonene...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray generously onto your wrists, neck, and pulse points; your body heat will help to diffuse fragrance as the day goes on..-PHLUR fragrances can be worn alone or layered with other PHLUR fragrances and body care products to create your own signature scent.
